alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 10:03PM EST until February 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At McConnelsville affecting Washington and Morgan Counties. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At McConnelsville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Route 669 above Malta and other roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday afternoon to a crest of 11.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 04/14/1948. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 615 AM EST.
